# f5distributedcloud_crl (Resource)

Manages an F5 XC CRL (Certificate Revocation List) resource.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the CRL.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the CRL is created.

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the CRL.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the CRL.
